Zendesk to Markdown

Input Zendesk Comment HTML

Output Markdown for Macro

Updates 08/11/16:

  • Bold <b> in addition to <strong>
  • Italics <i> in addition to <em>
  • Paragraph breaks inside quotes should be handled more consistently
  • Majority of cases involving spaces around bold and italics handled to prevent stray Markdown

How to Use:

  1. In Google Chrome, in Zendesk, Right-click on comment reply box -> "Inspect"
  2. In Google Chrome, Right-click on div class="zd-comment" -> "Edit as HTML"
  3. Select all, Copy all
  4. Paste into left box
  5. Click button
  6. Copy output into Zendesk's Macro box

Currently supports:

  • Bold
  • Italics
  • Lists: Ordered and Unordered
  • Headers
  • Quotes
  • Links
  • Div Removal
  • P Removal
  • Span Removal
  • Keeps &nbsp; (double spaces)!

NOT supported:

  • Nested quotes/lists
